TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 序列化物件 Graph 為一系列的 CodeDOM 陳述式 (Statement)。

span.span: Serializes an object graph to a series of CodeDOM statements.

summary.span: 這個類別為序列化工具提供抽象基底類別。

span.span: This class provides an abstract base class for a serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以實作自訂控制元件初始化程式碼可類型的元件產生設計階段。You can implement a custom to control the generation of component initialization code for a type of component at design time. 若要實作自訂對於類型，您必須：To implement a custom for a type, you must: 1. 定義衍生自 的類別。Define a class that derives from . 2. 實作方法的覆寫序列化或還原序列化方法。Implement method overrides for serialization or deserialization methods. （請參閱下列資訊，如需詳細資訊）。(See the information below for details.) 3. 將您的自訂之元件所使用的類型實作。Associate your custom implementation with a type of component using a . 若要實作序列化方法產生元件的組態程式碼：To implement a serialization method for generating configuration code for a component: 1. 類別衍生自內、 覆寫適當的序列化或還原序列化的基底類別的方法。Within a class that derives from , override an appropriate serialization or deserialization method of the base class. 2. 如果您想要產生程式碼陳述式執行預設元件設定預設序列化程式，您必須取得並呼叫該元件的基底的序列化程式。If you want the default serializer to generate code statements that perform the default component configuration, you must obtain and call the base serializer for the component. 若要取得該元件的基底的序列化程式，請呼叫方法傳遞至您的方法覆寫。To obtain the base serializer for the component, call the method of the passed to your method override. 傳遞方法要序列化的組態，以及您所要求，序列化程式也就是基底類型的元件類型。Pass the method the type of the component to serialize the configuration of, along with the base type of serializer you are requesting, which is . 在上呼叫方法會覆寫具有相同名稱的基底的序列化程式，並使用和物件傳遞到方法的覆寫。Call the method of the same name you are overriding on the base serializer, using the and object passed to your method override. 如果您實作方法，的基底的序列化程式的方法會傳回物件。If you are implementing the method, the method of the base serializer will return an object. 此物件的類型取決於基底的序列化程式，這取決於您所序列化的值的元件類型的類型。The type of this object depends on the type of base serializer which depends on the type of component you are serializing the values of. 如果您實作， ，或方法，您必須建立新包含產生的程式碼陳述式中，並將它傳遞至方法。If you are implementing the , , or method, you must create a new to contain the generated code statements, and pass it to the method. 3. 如果您已經呼叫基底的序列化程式方法，您就必須，其中包含要初始化元件產生的陳述式。If you have called a base serializer method, you will have a that contains the statements to generate to initialize the component. 否則，您應該建立。Otherwise you should create a . 您可以加入代表在加入此集合的元件組態程式碼中產生的陳述式的物件。You can add objects representing statements to generate in the component configuration code to this collection. 4. 傳回，代表要設定元件所產生的原始程式碼。Return the that represents the source code to generate to configure the component. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何建立自訂的 CodeDOM 序列化程式衍生自。The following code example illustrates how to create a custom CodeDOM serializer that derives from . [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#1)]

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立物件，並解決資料類型使用的序列化管理員。This method uses the serialization manager to create objects and resolve data types. 會傳回物件圖形的根。The root of the object graph is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相當於呼叫，不過，若產生的陳述式的變數指派陳述式、 變數宣告與初始化運算式或欄位指派陳述式，則會傳回物件執行個體。The is equivalent of calling , except that it returns an object instance if the resulting statement was a variable assign statement, a variable declaration with an init expression, or a field assignment statement.

span.span: This returns if no reference expression can be obtained for the specified value, or the value cannot be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是類似於，只不過它會停止如果它無法取得之值的簡單參考運算式。This method is similar to , except that it stops if it cannot obtain a simple reference expression for the value. 當您預期要做為參數或陳述式的目標所產生的運算式時，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you expect the resulting expression to be used as a parameter or target of a statement.
